label: Intellectual Property
description: Protecting and managing intellectual property rights.
intents: Searching for existing patents or trademarks

subcategories.label: Trademark Registration
subcategories.description: Registering a unique name, logo, or symbol to identify a product or service.

subcategories.label: Patent Application
subcategories.description: Applying for legal protection of an invention or idea.

subcategories.label: Copyright Protection
subcategories.description: Protecting original works of authorship, such as books, music, and software.

subcategories.label: Intellectual Property Management
subcategories.description: Managing and enforcing intellectual property rights.

subcategories.label: Trademark Search
subcategories.description: Searching for existing trademarks to avoid infringement.

subcategories.label: Patent Search
subcategories.description: Searching for existing patents to avoid infringement and assess market competition.

subcategories.label: Intellectual Property Sales
subcategories.description: Selling or buying intellectual property rights.
